title: What is this tool called?
content:
I am wondering what this tool is called? The wooden-handled thing with a metal tip the shape of half a heart. Please help! Thanks all!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317203436im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cbe9b76244e5b11ba7859468bdb78556_5705.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317203436im_/http:/typophile.com/files/4fae9918b8e5404ef5f54f904e8609be_6143.jpg)
author: evanmacdonald

comments.content: Dunno, I have a few of them myself except mine have bakelite handles.

It is a folded ruling pen, you may purchase one here: [http://www.johnnealbooks.com/prod\_detail\_list/13](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317203436/http:/www.johnnealbooks.com/prod_detail_list/13 "http://www.johnnealbooks.com/prod\_detail\_list/13")

I have several of these, the N30 and N45 are my favorites.

You can also make your own… : ) Eg with a piece of a soda can, etc.

Goggle for calligraphy and lettering tools…
